import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-about', templateUrl: './about.component.html', styleUrls: ['./about.component.css'] }) export class AboutComponent { }

I'm Onkar.

A Programmer.

Design & Development

Capable of Documentation and Deployment on live site.
Excellent self-starter & Quick learner of new concepts, and technology &open to any challenges at workplace.
